sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Link, withRouter} from "react-router-dom";
import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid";
import Card from "@material-ui/core/Card";
import CardActionArea from "@material-ui/core/CardActionArea";
import CardMedia from "@material-ui/core/CardMedia";
import CardContent from "@material-ui/core/CardContent";
import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography";
import CardActions from "@material-ui/core/CardActions";
import styled from 'styled-components'
import IconButton from "@material-ui/core/IconButton";
import VisibilityIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Visibility';
import List from '@material-ui/core/List';
import ListItem from '@material-ui/core/ListItem';
import ListItemIcon from '@material-ui/core/ListItemIcon';
import StarIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Star';
import AccessibilityIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Accessibility';

const CompCardContent = styled(CardContent)`
    flex-grow: 1;
    text-align: left;
    padding-bottom: 0;
`

const CompCardPreview = styled(CardMedia)`
    margin: auto;
`

const CompCard = styled(Card)`
        height: 100%;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;

        border: 1px solid #fff;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .95);
        
        &:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 5px 8px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, .95);
        }
`

const CompCardIconsList = styled(List)`
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    padding: 0;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    height: 100%;
`

const CompCardListItem = styled(ListItem)`
    width: auto;
    padding: 0 auto;
`

const CompCardIcon = styled(ListItemIcon)`
    min-width: auto;
`

function CompositionCard({info, ...props}) {
    const {id, title, price, thumbnail} = info

    return (
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={10} md={6} lg={4} xl={3}>
            <CompCard>
                <CardActionArea>
                    <CompCardPreview component="img" height="320" image={thumbnail} alt={title}/>
                </CardActionArea>
                <CompCardContent>
                    <Grid container justify="flex-start" wrap="nowrap">
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                            <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="h3" noWrap title={title}>
                                {title}
                            </Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2" component="p" noWrap title={`${price} $`}>
                                {price} $
                            </Typography>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                            <CompCardIconsList>
                                <CompCardListItem disableGutters>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <AccessibilityIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem><CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <AccessibilityIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                                <CompCardListItem>
                                    <CompCardIcon>
                                        <StarIcon/>
                                    </CompCardIcon>
                                </CompCardListItem>
                            </CompCardIconsList>
                        </Grid>
                    </Grid>
                </CompCardContent>
                <CardActions>
                    <IconButton component={Link} to={`/showcase/${id + 1}`} aria-label="view">
                        <VisibilityIcon fontSize="small"/>
                    </IconButton>
                </CardActions>
            </CompCard>
        </Grid>
    );
}

export default withRouter(CompositionCard)
